title: Project-Based Teaching Methods for Collaborative Multimedia Design and Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics concepts and digital tool application experience
context.additional_context: Team project for developing multimedia content for math education, with collaborative learning based on a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can develop prototypes of mathematics educational content by applying a multimedia design process in a collaborative environment.
Learners can correct conceptual errors occurring during the multimedia development process three or more times using a team-based feedback system.
Learners can propose two or more multimedia representation strategies for complex mathematical concepts using visual thinking tools (e.g., mental model drawing).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
